CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. A10 reads: "Loendi Hostesses - When the good ship Avalon floats down the beautiful Ohio, Memorial Day, for Loendi Club's gala moonlight cruise, the above group of hostesses will be on hand to add additional glamour along with those listed last week...-Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Sisters Vera Thompson (Matthews) and Alberta Thompson seated on sofa in front of dark horizontal striped curtain
